channel.title: Dung points via lamp

item.title: Dung points via lamp
item.dc:creator: @Skyro Arbe
item.description:
@Skyro wrote:

	[code=java]if(itemId == 4447) {	
		c.getPA().addSkillXP(10000, 24);
                    c.getItem().addItem(###,40); // Only if your dung tokens are items in-game.
		c.sendMessage("You rub the lamp and feel yourself further in the arts of dungeoneering.");
		c.getItems().deleteItem(4447, 1);	
	}[/code]

if(itemId == 4447) { c.getPA().addSkillXP(10000, 24); c.dungPoints += 40; // If your dung points are stored in a variable. Note, dungpoints is just what I called them, you'd have to change that to refer what there called in your server. c.sendMessage("You rub the lamp and feel yourself further in the arts of dungeoneering."); c.getItems().deleteItem(4447, 1); }

Read full topic

item.title: Dung points via lamp
item.dc:creator: @rite4dead rite4dead
item.description:
@rite4dead wrote:

Basically I have a lamp which gives dung XP.

if(itemId == 4447) { c.getPA().addSkillXP(10000, 24); c.sendMessage("You rub the lamp and feel yourself further in the arts of dungeoneering."); c.getItems().deleteItem(4447, 1); }

What do I add in there so it also gives like 40 Dung points too?
So you’d be getting 10k Exp and 40 Dung points per lamp and not just exp?

I just don’t know the code for it :S

Read full topic
